name: Chimpezoids - Prototype
description:
Took a small break from bigger projects to work on a goofy little monkey fighting game.

I'm going to make the cast into different monkey types, but for now they're just different colored chimps - with similar movesets but varying special abilities.

Controls are:

X - Left Hand (Kick attack in the air)
Y - Right Hand (Slam attack in the air)
B - Monkey Ability

A- Jump

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SoXRIVdbeWU&list=PL5Jt4LWBDonTv9cYq5EcXnpx7Fjtlk0yQ&index=1
